# Perform a rolling join to join the most recent ranking to the next game.
bb_data_detail <- bb_data_detail %>%
  arrange(Season, DayNum) %>%
  left_join(bb_rankings %>% arrange(Season, RankingDayNum),
            by = join_by(Season == Season, closest(SeasonDate > RankingDayNum))) %>%
  group_by(Season.x, SeasonDate.x) %>%
  slice(n()) %>%
  ungroup()
